message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with stochastic optimization for learning the structure and parameters of Ising models, which is a problem in machine learning and statistical inference. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT), as well as optimization and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the problem of learning sparse Ising models is related to statistical physics (cs.SI), which is another possible sub-category.
